cac:SpecificTendererRequirement.cbc:Description: Please refer to section 3.1 the RFT for further information

cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: FCT085F Single Supplier Framework Contract for the supply of Electrical Goods (White Goods, Small Appliances and Tv's)
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: The Contracting Authority invites tenders (“Tenders”) from economic operators (“Tenderers”) for the award of a single supplier framework contract for the supply of the goods as described in Appendix 1 to this RFT (“the Goods”). 1.2 In summary, the Goods comprise: White Goods This is defined as all the large goods most common in a domestic kitchen. It includes but not limited to fridges, freezers, washing machines, dryers, dishwashers etc. Small Appliances Vacuum cleaners, toasters, kettles, travel kettles, microwaves, cd players, portable radios, irons, hair dryers, hair clippers, desk lamps, portable fans etc. Televisions, Including brackets and installation, if required. Tenderers must be in a position to supply all of the products/services and these products/services must all be priced for the particular lot(s) being tendered for.
